post.description: Creates a new user account with the provided details. Throttling applied: max 5 attempts per minute.

post.summary: Authenticate a user and obtain an access token
post.description: Authenticates a user using their login and password, returning an access token upon successful authentication. Throttling applied: max 5 attempts per minute.
Logs out the currently authenticated user by revoking their access token. Requires a valid bearer token in the Authorization header.
Allows an authenticated user to create a critic for a film. A user can only create one critic per film. Throttling: 60 requests per minute.

film_id.description: ID of the film to review

403.description: User has already submitted a critic for this film

message.example: User has already submitted a critic for this film.

items.example: The selected film id is invalid.
The score field must not be greater than 10.

post.description: Creates a new film with the provided details. Admin access required. Throttling: 60 requests per minute.

description.example: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality.

put.description: Updates all information of an existing film. Admin access required. Throttling: 60 requests per minute.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the film to update

description.example: Neo and his allies race against time before the machines discover the city of Zion.

delete.description: Deletes a film and manages related data (actors, critics). Admin access required. Throttling: 60 requests per minute.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the film to delete

get.description: Allows an authenticated user to view their own information only. Cannot view other users' information. Throttling: 60 requests per minute.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User ID (must match the authenticated user's ID)

403.description: Access denied - You can only view your own information

message.example: You can only view your own information.

patch.description: Allows an authenticated user to change their own password. Requires password confirmation. User cannot change another user's password. Throttling: 60 requests per minute.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: User ID (must match the authenticated user's ID)

403.description: Access denied - You can only update your own password

message.example: You can only update your own password.

items.example: The password field must be at least 8 characters.
The password confirmation does not match.

bearerAuth.description: Use a bearer token to access these endpoints
bearerAuth.name: Token
